title: Ee-Lectric

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ee-Lectric shoots an electric projectile straight at a target, Short-circuiting and charging them.
- Ee-Lectric's ultimate ability. A line of two thunderbolts are summoned from the sky, Permanently Short-circuiting and Overcharging their targets. (2 uses, shared by non-killing mutants)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a charged player visits another, they will both be roleblocked and the status is consumed, players will know they are charged.
- If an overcharged player visits or is visited a non-mutant, the target/visitor will become Short-circuited and Charged.
- You know the names of all charged players at all times.

desc:
Post 3522
*An aqua-colored, bipedal mutant with a slender, eel-like body. Its hands and feet are both webbed and clawed, it possesses powerful electric powers.*
